attributes.action: Scrap VED and add a small amout to fuel duty to crate a fair road useage policy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The purpose of this would be to create a non avoidable duty and create a true pay as you drive system.The bigger the car the more you pay and the more miles you do the more you pay.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence - 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=road+charges
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
